T02D3437:95b-1: shr'i lo ka n'a tha s'a dha nam /
T02D3437:96a-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3437:96a-3: gang gi ming tsam gyis kyang ni //
T02D3437:96a-4: dpal ldan bskal pa brgyar 'jug pa'i //
T02D3437:96a-5: 'jig rten dbang phyug la btud nas //
T02D3437:96a-6: sgrub thabs bsdus pa bshad par bya //
T02D3437:96a-7: 'dir dang por re zhig lhag par sgom par byed pa'i sngags pas snga bar langs te /
T02D3437:96a-8: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas 'ga' zhig tu stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3437:96a-9: yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis gnas dang bdag bsrung ba'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T02D3437:96a-10: mdun du kha che skyes dang tsandan dmar pos mandal
T02D3437:96a-11: zlum po la nye bar byugs te skad cig gis
T02D3437:96a-12: stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas /
T02D3437:96a-13: rang gi snying gar aa yig las skyes pa'i zla
T02D3437:96a-14: ba'i dkyil 'khor snying gi mun pa 'joms pa yongs
T02D3437:96a-15: su spros nas / chu skyes dmar po skya rengs
T02D3437:96a-16: shar ba lta bu la 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro
T02D3437:96a-18: de las 'od 'phros te phyogs bcu khyab par byas
T02D3437:96a-19: nas yongs su 'phro ba'i hr'i: yig gi lcags kyus
T02D3437:96a-20: mdun gyi nam mkha' la gdan drangs te /
T02D3437:96a-21: 'jig rten mtha' dag gcig tu gdon par 'dod pa'i
T02D3437:96a-22: mkhas pas bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa
T02D3437:96a-23: dang chu skyes kyi phyag rgya can rnams rnam par
T02D3437:96a-24: bltas te me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lngas
T02D3437:96a-26: de rnams kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas /
T02D3437:96a-27: sdig bshags pa la sogs pa btang snyoms kyi bar du ji snyed pa rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D3437:96a-28: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D3437:96a-29: zhes pas lhag par grol bar byas la /
T02D3437:96a-30: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko&amp ;
T02D3437:96a-31: ham zhes pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3437:96a-32: de nas snga bar smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug
T02D3437:96a-33: pas snying rje chen pos rab tu sad nas pam
T02D3437:96a-34: yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs pa'i chu skyes la
T02D3437:96a-35: gnas pa dbyangs dang po las skyes pa'i zla ba'i
T02D3437:96a-37: bandu ka skyes pa'i mdog lta bu'i hr'i:yig las skyes
T02D3437:96a-38: shing hr'i:yig gis lhag par gnas pa'i dbus su nyi
T02D3437:96a-39: ma'i 'od zer dang mtshungs pa'i chu skyes bsam par
T02D3437:96a-40: bya'o // de nas sa bon gyi yi ge las nges par 'phros te /
T02D3437:96a-41: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3437:96a-42: byang chub sems dpa' rnams gsal bar mdzad nas /
T02D3437:96b-0: de rnams @96b kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ro mnyam par gyur te /
T02D3437:96b-1: de la de bzhin du zhugs par bsam mo //
T02D3437:96b-2: sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i padma yongs su gyur pa
T02D3437:96b-3: las padma dang zla ba'i steng du mnyam pa'i zhabs
T02D3437:96b-4: kyis bzhugs pa / glog dang byi ru'i kha dog lta bu /
T02D3437:96b-5: padma rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' ba /
T02D3437:96b-6: autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar yangs pa'i spyan zung dang ldan pa /
T02D3437:96b-7: dbu skra gnag cing ring ba lha'i gos dang rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3437:96b-9: g-yon pa dag gis mchog sbyin dang /
T02D3437:96b-10: chu skyes dmar po bsnams pa /
T02D3437:96b-11: lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu 'od zer dmar po 'phro zhing nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D3437:96b-12: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i snying gar rang gi sa bon gyi byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D3437:96b-15: nu ma'i bar du yi ge gsum gyis brgyan pa'i
T02D3437:96b-16: dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skur bdag nyid
T02D3437:96b-17: bsgom par bya'o // de nas me la sogs pa'i
T02D3437:96b-18: mtshams rnams su padma la gnas pa'i ku mu da'i
T02D3437:96b-19: gnyen gyi steng du dkar po dang /
T02D3437:96b-22: ljang gu'i l'am m'am p'am t'am gi yi ge yongs su gyur pa las ;
T02D3437:96b-23: de'i sku mdog can thal mo sbyar zhing pus mo
T02D3437:96b-24: sa la btsugs pa la lang tsho gzhon nu dang
T02D3437:96b-25: ldan pa / sna tshogs pa'i rin po che dang /
T02D3437:96b-26: gos kyis brgyan pa 'gying zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang ldan pa'i spyan ma dang /
T02D3437:96b-29: sgrol ma rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3437:96b-30: de'i rjes su rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi
T02D3437:96b-31: rgyal po las 'od zer 'phros te hr'i:'i 'od zer
T02D3437:96b-32: gyi lcags kyus mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D3437:96b-33: khams na / dam tshig sems dpa' dang 'dra ba'i
T02D3437:96b-34: ye shes sems dpa' gdan drangs nas nam mkha'i mthil
T02D3437:96b-35: khams na / du bltas te / dam tshig sems dpa' dang /
T02D3437:96b-37: aa bhi shinytsa tu m'am sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes pas mngon par mchod nas /
T02D3437:96b-38: nam mkha'i mthil du song ste bdud rtsis gang ba'i
T02D3437:96b-39: rin po che'i bum pa rnams kyis aom a'a:sarba ta
T02D3437:97a-0: th'a ga t'a bhi she ka ta @97a * //
T02D3437:97a-1: sa ma ya shri ye h'um zhes brjod nas bdag la dbang bskur bar mdzad cing /
T02D3437:97a-2: bdag nyid kyi spyi bor ngag gi dbang phyug bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3437:97a-3: de nas rang gi sa bon las skyes pa'i 'od
T02D3437:97a-4: zer gyi dra bas nam mkha'i mthil mtha' dag khyab
T02D3437:97a-5: cing nye bar spyad pa gcig tu rab tu mang
T02D3437:97a-6: po spros nas bzhi po dga' zhing dga' ba'i tshogs
T02D3437:97a-7: rnams kyis bdag la mngon par mchod par bsgom par
T02D3437:97a-8: bya'o // de nas yongs su 'phro ba'i 'od zer dmar po rab tu brkyang ste /
T02D3437:97a-9: sdig pa'i gnas su lhung ba'i srog chags rnams bton
T02D3437:97a-10: nas bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la nges par sbyar
T02D3437:97a-11: nas smin cing grol bar bya'o //
T02D3437:97a-12: rang gi cho gas bsdus nas bya ste /
T02D3437:97a-13: skad cig gis bsam par bya'o //
T02D3437:97a-14: ngal bar gyur na snying ga'i sa bon gyi dbus su bsdus nas /
T02D3437:97a-15: dam tshig gi sa bon dang rang bzhin gyi sa
T02D3437:97a-16: bon gyi sngags kyi rgyal po bzung nas bzlas par
T02D3437:97a-17: bya'o // de'i rjes su bdag nyid me tog la
T02D3437:97a-18: sogs pa'i nyer spyod rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas
T02D3437:97a-19: bya'o // / 'byung po thams cad la ji ltar mthun pa'i gtor ma dbul zhing /
T02D3437:97a-21: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3437:97a-22: yongs su bsngo ba yang byas nas /
T02D3437:97a-23: yi ge gsum gyi sngags brjod de /
T02D3437:97a-24: lha mo bzhi snying ga'i sa bon la bsdus nas langs te /
T02D3437:97a-26: gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i thun mtshams dag la snying
T02D3437:97a-27: ga'i sa bon las lha mo bzhi dbugs la zhugs
T02D3437:97a-28: nas cho ga snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D3437:97a-29: thun mtshams bzhi pa la snga ma bzhin du byas nas /
T02D3437:97a-30: aom a'a:badzra mu:zhes pas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs te
T02D3437:97a-31: lha mo rang gi snying ga'i sa bon la bcug
T02D3437:97a-32: nas / ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin gnas par bya'o ;
T02D3437:97a-33: / nyal ba'i dus su don dam pa'i sems mngon du byas nas nyal bar bya'o //
T02D3437:97a-34: sngags pas snga bar smon lam gyi dbang gis rab
T02D3437:97a-35: tu sad nas langs te ji lta ba bzhin du
